title: CDC – “It’s not too late to get vaccinated. You can get the Monkeypox vaccine at the same time you get your Flu and Covid vaccines”
cleaned_text: It’s not too late to get vaccinated. You can get the #mpox vaccine at the same time as your #flu and #COVID vaccines. Dr. Demetre Daskalakis encourages you to talk to your vaccinator about what is right for you.t.co/1vd9W6Usan pic.twitter.com/GPSnNFBOqZ

opengraph.title: CDC – “It’s not too late to get vaccinated. You can get the Monkeypox vaccine at the same time you get your Flu and Covid vaccines”
